name: Pravda (JoaoNoronha)
description: For the Systems course, I created “PRAVDA”, an interactive installation that utilizes a playful system of conflict interaction between truth and lies to engage the participants. Using Twitter feeds as a starting point, their mission is to identify the truth and expose the lies in the media, working together to combat disinformation. In order to effectively do so, the participants must develop critical thinking skills and strategize their actions, ultimately striving for a ‘liberating truth’. To bring this project to life, I utilized a range of tools including Blender, Unity, and Virtual Reality software.
